entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Rain showers or flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
